message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can have less, I'll take more!
You're being greedy, I'll give you a slightly better deal
You're getting desperate, I'll give you a chance to think
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't expect too much
You're running out of options, this is my final offer
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of
